Method Detail

getISBN

public java.lang.String getISBN()
Returns the isbn code as a String. Note that there is no mutator method so the isbn cannot be altered once the book has been created.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
Returns the title of this book.

setTitle

public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
Changes the title of this book.

getAuthors

public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> getAuthors()
Returns an iterator of the author names for this book. Note that the remove method of the iterator throws an exception so the iterator cannot be used to modify the list of authors.

setAuthors

public void setAuthors(java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> authors)
Sets the list of all author names for the book. Note that this replaces the previous list of authors.

hasPublisher

public boolean hasPublisher()
Returns whether or not the publisher of this book is known.

getPublisher

public Publisher getPublisher()
Returns the publisher of this book, or null if unknown.

setPublisher

public void setPublisher(Publisher publisher)
Sets the publisher of this book.

getCover

public Book.Cover getCover()
Returns the cover of this book as one of the enumerated type Book.Cover.HARD or Book.Cover.SOFT.

setCover

public void setCover(Book.Cover cover)
Sets the cover of this book as one of the enumerated type Book.Cover.HARD or Book.Cover.SOFT.

hasEdition

public boolean hasEdition()
Returns whether or not the edition of this book is known.

getEdition

public int getEdition()
Returns the edition of this book, or 0 if unknown.

setEdition

public void setEdition(int edition)
Sets the edition of this book.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a string representation of this book that lists all its fields.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

preparePanel

public javax.swing.JComponent preparePanel()
Returns a panel holding the attributes of the book that allows all fields except the isbn to be edited.

main

Driver main method to demonstrate how to use the Book class and display the results in a GUI panel.
